Tickets Created/Updated on 2025-09-21.description: This section provides a summary of all tickets (leads) created or updated on the specified date. It includes client details, status, and contact information, helping you track new and ongoing opportunities.

Quotes & Proforma Invoices Processed/Upd.description: This section provides a summary of all Quotes & Proforma Invoices issued on the specified date. It includes customer details, quote amounts, and their current status, giving a comprehensive overview of quote activity.

Projects Created/Updated on 2025-09-21.description: This section summarizes all projects created or updated on the specified date, including project titles, related quotes, customers, and responsible staff.

Gross Profit for Projects Ended on 2025-.description: This section provides the gross profit analysis for projects that ended on the specified date. It highlights income, expenses, and resulting profit margins.

Invoices Processed/Updated on 2025-09-21.description: This section lists all invoices generated or updated on the specified date, including customer details, amounts, taxes, and due dates.

Invoice Payments Processed/Updated on 20.description: This section lists invoice payments processed or updated on the specified date, detailing payment methods, accounts, and amounts.

Purchases Processed/Updated on 2025-09-2.description: This section provides an overview of all purchases created or updated on the specified date, including suppliers, amounts, and tax summaries.

Purchase Orders Created/Updated on 2025-.description: This section lists purchase orders created or updated on the specified date. It includes supplier, currency, totals, taxes, and amounts paid.

GRNs Created/Updated on 2025-09-21.description: This section provides a summary of all Goods Receive Notes (GRNs) created or updated on the specified date.

Bank Transfers Created/Updated on 2025-0.description: This section lists bank transfers created or updated on the specified date, including debit/credit accounts, methods, and amounts.

Bill Payments Created/Updated on 2025-09.description: This section summarizes bill payments created or updated on the specified date, including supplier, paid accounts, and allocation details.

Customer Complaints.description: This section highlights all customer complaints received or updated on the specified date, including type, status, and resolution progress.

Leave Applications.description: This section lists all employee leave applications submitted or updated on the specified date, including category, duration, and approval status.

Document Manager Updates.description: This section provides updates from the document manager, showing documents issued, renewed, or expiring on the specified date.

H&S Tracking.description: This section provides all Health & Safety records logged or updated on the specified date.

Quality Tracking.description: This section provides all Quality Tracking entries created or updated on the specified date.

Environmental Tracking.description: This section provides all Environmental Tracking entries created or updated on the specified date.

Sent SMS on 2025-09-21.description: This section lists all SMS messages sent or scheduled on the specified date, including costs and delivery status.

Cashbook Balance Summary.description: This section summarizes the organizationâ€™s cashbook balances across multiple periods (today, yesterday, 7-day, 30-day).

7 Day Tenants.description: This section lists tenants within 7 days of cutoff, helping monitor potential service suspensions.

Birthdays Today.description: This section lists employees celebrating birthdays today.

Stock Alerts.description: This section highlights products whose stock levels have fallen below their defined alert thresholds.

7 Day Labour Hours.description: This section shows the labor hours recorded over the last 7 days, including totals.

BoQ Valuations.description: This section lists Bill of Quantity (BoQ) valuations processed or updated on the specified date.

Tenders.description: This section provides all tenders created or updated on the specified date, including submission and site visit dates, amounts, and bid bonds.
